00140 void PCA::reset( )

00143     countM    = 0;
00144     meanM     = 0.;
00145     covarM    = 0.;

00149 //===========================================================================
00174 void PCA::update( )
00175 {
00176   // Only updating, when matrix is modified and
00177   // function "train" was called before: 
00178   if( modifiedM && meanM.nelem( ) > 0 && countM > 0 )
00179   {
00180     // The "real" covariance matrix:
00181     Array2D< double > cmatL( meanM.dim( 0 ), meanM.dim( 0 ) );
00182     // Allocate memory for eigenvalues-vector:
00183     dvecL.resize( meanM.dim( 0 ) );
00184 
00185     // Compute "real" covariance matrix:
00186     for( unsigned i = 0; i < meanM.dim( 0 ); ++i )
00187     {
00188       double t = meanM( i ) / countM;
00189 
00190             for( unsigned j = 0; j <= i; ++j )
00191                         {
00192                 cmatL( i, j ) = ( covarM( i, j ) - meanM( j ) * t ) / countM;
00193                         }
00194         }
00195 
00196         //
00197         // compute transformation matrix
00198         //
00199                 if( whiteningM )
00200                 {
00201                         rankDecomp( cmatL, transMatM, dvecL );
00202                 }
00203                 else
00204                 {
00205                    eigensymm( cmatL, transMatM, dvecL );
00206                    //eigensymm_obsolete( cmatL, transMatM, dvecL );
00207                 }
00208 
00209                 modifiedM = false;
00210   }
00211 }

00318 void PCA::train( const Array< double >& v )
00319 {
00320   // Only for vector or 2-dimensional matrix:
00321   SIZE_CHECK( v.ndim( ) == 1 || v.ndim( ) == 2 )
00322 
00323   // 2-dimensional matrix:
00324   if ( v.ndim( ) == 2 )
00325   {
00326     // Calling "train" for each data vector:
00327     for ( unsigned i = 0; i < v.dim( 0 ); ++i )
00328     {
00329       train( v[ i ] );
00330     }
00331   } else {
00332   // Vector:
00333     if ( meanM.nelem( ) != v.dim( 0 ) )
00334     {
00335       if( countM > 0 )
00336       {
00337         throw 1;
00338       } else {
00339         meanM .resize( v.dim( 0 ) );
00340         meanM  = 0.;
00341         covarM.resize( v.dim( 0 ), v.dim( 0 ) );
00342         covarM = 0.;
00343       }
00344     }
00345 
00346     ++countM;
00347 
00348     for( unsigned i = 0; i < meanM.dim( 0 ); ++i )
00349     {
00350       double t = v( i );
00351       meanM( i ) += t;
00352 
00353       for( unsigned j = 0; j <= i; ++j )
00354       {
00355         covarM( i, j ) += v( j ) * t;
00356       }
00357     }
00358 
00359     modifiedM = true;
00360   }
00361 }

00364 //===========================================================================
00391 void PCA::transform
00392 (
00393     const Array< double >& v,
00394     Array< double >& w,
00395     unsigned maxDimA
00396 )
00397 {
00398     unsigned                 i(0),         // counter
00399                              j(0),         // variables
00400                              v_dims,       // no. of dimensions of v.
00401                              v_dim1(0),    // x-dimension of v.
00402                              v_dim2(0),    // y-dimension of v.
00403                              mean_dim1(0); // x-dimension of mean value matrix.
00404     double                   t(0.);        // Stores single values for w.
00405     ArrayReference< double > wi;           // reference to a single 
00406                                            // transformed data vector
00407 
00408 
00409     v_dims = v.ndim();
00410     if (v_dims >= 1) v_dim1 = v.dim( 0 );
00411     if (v_dims >= 2) v_dim2 = v.dim( 1 );
00412     mean_dim1 = meanM.dim( 0 );
00413  
00414     // Check if transformation matrix exists:
00415     if ( meanM.nelem( ) == 0 || countM == 0 )
00416     {
00417         throw 1;
00418     }
00419 
00420     // Transform several data-vectors:
00421     if ( v_dims == 2 )
00422     {
00423         // Possibly set valid value for dimension reduction:
00424         if ( maxDimA == 0 || maxDimA > v_dim2 )
00425         {
00426             maxDimA = v_dim2;
00427         }
00428 
00429         // Allocate memory for transformed data-vectors: 
00430         w.resize( v_dim1, maxDimA );
00431 
00432         // Perform transformation for each single data vector:
00433         for ( i = 0; i < v_dim1; ++i )
00434         {
00435             wi.copyReference( w[ i ] );
00436             transform( v[ i ], static_cast< Array< double >& >( wi ), 
00437                        maxDimA );
00438         }
00439     }
00440     else
00441     {
00442     // Transform a single data-vector:
00443 
00444         // Update of transformation matrix for each single data-vector:
00445         update( );
00446 
00447         // Possibly set valid value for dimension reduction:
00448         if ( maxDimA == 0 || maxDimA > v_dim1 )
00449         {
00450             maxDimA = v_dim1;
00451         }
00452 
00453         // Allocate memory for transformed data-vector:  
00454         w.resize( maxDimA );
00455 
00456         if ( removeMeanM )
00457         {
00458             // Move mean value of data to the zero point: 
00459             Array< double > vv( v - meanM / double( countM ) );
00460 
00461             // Transform data vector by multiplying it with the
00462             // transformation matrix:
00463             for ( i = maxDimA; i--; )
00464             {
00465                 t = 0.;
00466 
00467                 for ( j = mean_dim1; j--; )
00468                 {
00469                     t += transMatM( j, i ) * vv( j );
00470                 }
00471                 w( i ) = t;
00472             }
00473         } 
00474         else
00475         {
00476             // Transform data vector by multiplying it with the
00477             // transformation matrix:
00478             for ( i = maxDimA; i--; )
00479             {
00480                 t = 0.;
00481 
00482                 for ( j = mean_dim1; j--; )
00483                 {
00484                     t += transMatM( j, i ) * v( j );
00485                 }
00486                 w( i ) = t;
00487             }
00488         }
00489     }
00490 }

00529 void PCA::rtransform
00530 (
00531     const Array< double >& v,
00532     Array< double >& w,
00533     unsigned maxDimA
00534 )
00535 {
00536     unsigned                 i(0),         // counter
00537                              j(0),         // variables
00538                              v_dims,       // no. of dimensions of v.
00539                              v_dim1(0),    // x-dimension of v.
00540                              v_dim2(0),    // y-dimension of v.
00541                              mean_dim1(0); // x-dimension of mean value matrix.
00542     double                   t(0.);        // Stores single values for w.
00543     ArrayReference< double > wi;           // reference to a single 
00544                                            // retransformed data vector
00545 
00546 
00547     v_dims = v.ndim();
00548     if (v_dims >= 1) v_dim1 = v.dim( 0 );
00549     if (v_dims >= 2) v_dim2 = v.dim( 1 );
00550     mean_dim1 = meanM.dim( 0 );
00551  
00552     // Check if transformation matrix exists:
00553     if ( meanM.nelem( ) == 0 || countM == 0 )
00554     {
00555         throw 1;
00556     }
00557 
00558     // Retransform several data-vectors:
00559     if ( v_dims == 2 )
00560     {
00561         // Possibly set valid value for dimension reduction:
00562         if ( maxDimA == 0 )
00563         {
00564             maxDimA = v_dim2;
00565         }
00566 
00567         // Allocate memory for retransformed data-vectors: 
00568         w.resize( v_dim1, maxDimA );
00569 
00570         // Perform retransformation for each single data vector:
00571         for ( i = 0; i < v_dim1; ++i )
00572         {
00573             wi.copyReference( w[ i ] );
00574             rtransform( v[ i ], static_cast< Array< double >& >( wi ), 
00575                        maxDimA );
00576         }
00577     }
00578     else
00579     {
00580     // Retransform a single data-vector:
00581 
00582         // Update of transformation matrix for each single data-vector:
00583         update( );
00584 
00585         // Possibly set valid value for dimension reduction:
00586         if ( maxDimA == 0 )
00587         {
00588             maxDimA = v_dim1;
00589         }
00590 
00591         // Allocate memory for retransformed data-vector:  
00592         // w.resize( maxDimA );
00593         // ThB-CHANGE of prev. line:
00594         w.resize( mean_dim1 );
00595 
00596         // Retransform data vector by multiplying it with the
00597         // inverted (transposed because of orthogonality)
00598         // transformation matrix:
00599        
00600         // for ( i = maxDimA; i--; )
00601         // ThB: change of prev. line:
00602         for ( i = mean_dim1; i--; )
00603         {
00604             t = 0.;
00605 
00606            // for ( j = mean_dim1; j--; )
00607            // ThB: change of prev. line:
00608            for ( j = maxDimA; j--; )
00609             {
00610                 if ( whiteningM )
00611                 {
00612                     // For a retransformation after whitening
00613                     // the scaling of the eigenvectors must be
00614                     // undone additionally. "dvecL" contains
00615                     // the eigenvalues.
00616                     t += transMatM( i, j ) * v( j ) * dvecL( j );
00617                 }
00618                 else
00619                 {
00620                     // "Normal" retransformation. 
00621                     t += transMatM( i, j ) * v( j );
00622                 }
00623             }
00624             if ( removeMeanM ) {
00625                 // Undo movement of mean value to zero point:
00626                 w( i ) = t + meanM( i ) / double( countM );
00627             } else {
00628                 w( i ) = t;
00629             }
00630         }
00631     }
00632 }

00656 Array< double > PCA::transMat( )
00657 {
00658         update( );
00659         return transMatM;
00660 }

00685 Array< double > PCA::eigVal( )
00686 {
00687         update( );
00688         return dvecL;
00689 }
